name: Flipper Pong
overview: Flipper Pong is a 2 player only French language Pong clone for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Michel Girboux and published in Hebdogiciel on the front page of N°041 (20.07.1984). Here is a Ping-Pong containing obstacles and a Bumper Central, original isn't it? For two players with joysticks..
